org.robolectric.shadows

Class ShadowPackageManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowPackageManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RobolectricPackageManager
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ShadowApplicationPackageManager, ShadowPackageManager.ShadowStubPackageManager

    @Implements(value=android.content.pm.PackageManager.class)
public abstract class ShadowPackageManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements RobolectricPackageManager
